#include <iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include <vector>
#include <sstream>
#include <iomanip>
using namespace std;

int main(int argc, char** argv) {

////////// DO NOT EDIT! //////////
  string path = argv[1];        //
//////////////////////////////////  

//add code below this line

ifstream file(path);  // open the CSV file
if (!file.is_open()) {
    cerr << "Could not open the file." << endl;
    return 1;
}

string line;
vector<string> southernCities;

// Skip the header line
getline(file, line);

while (getline(file, line)) {
    stringstream ss(line);
    string city, country, latStr, lonStr;

    // Read each field separated by commas
    getline(ss, city, ',');
    getline(ss, country, ',');
    getline(ss, latStr, ',');
    getline(ss, lonStr, ',');

    double latitude = stod(latStr); // convert latitude to number

    if (latitude < 0) {
        southernCities.push_back(city);
    }
}

file.close();

// Print the result
cout << "The following cities are in the Southern Hemisphere: ";
for (size_t i = 0; i < southernCities.size(); i++) {
    cout << southernCities[i];
    if (i != southernCities.size() - 1) {
        cout << ", ";
    } else {
        cout << ".";
    }
}
cout << endl;

//add code above this line

  return 0;
}
